mapper.insert:
select schedule_seq.nextval from dual
insert into schedule values(#{scdNo},#{memNo}, to_date(#{scdStart},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),to_date(#{scdEnd},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') ,#{scdContent})

select schedule_seq.nextval from dual
insert into schedule values(#{scdNo},#{memNo},#{scdStart},#{scdEnd} ,#{scdContent})
